subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king was the founder of the Kachhwaha Dynasty?
question_hi: कैष्वहाई समुदाय के लिए कौन सा सर संगठन करने वाला था?
explanation_en: Bhojraj Bapa (Rao Jodha) is known as the founder of the Kachhwaha Dynasty, which ruled the Rajasthan region during the medieval times. The Kachhwaha Dynasty is famous for establishing the city of Jaipur, also known as Pink City.
explanation_hi: बोझ्राज (राव जोधा) हिंदू राजनी के पुनियाँ पुलिस को मध्यम वर्षियाँ को राजस्थान के अन्धे राजनी पुलिस के अनम्बी डिस्टन के राजस्थान पुलिस के पुलिस के अन्धे राजनी
explanation_en: Pratap Singh Khatri, also known as Prithviraj Chauhan, is a famous historical figure associated with the establishment of the Rajasthan State. He was a Rajput king and played a significant role in the formation of the region.

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: Which royal family ruled Rajasthan from the 7th to the 15th century?
question_hi: राजस्थान को 7वेंद्रावती संतान मेंश्रावती संतान मेंश्रावत संतान
explanation_en: The Rathore Dynasty was a prominent royal family that ruled Rajasthan from the 12th to the 16th century. They are famous for establishing the city of Jaipur, also known as the Pink City.

subject: Rajputana
question_en: Which Rajput king established the city of Udaipur?
explanation_en: Tansen, also known as Tansen, was a Rajput king who founded Udaipur during the 13th century.

subject: Rajasthan
question_en: What is the largest desert in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Rao Jaisam, also known as Thakkar, was a Rajput king who conquered many territories during his reign. Among them, Bikanpur, also known as Bhilwan, is the largest town in Rajasthan.

question_en: Who established the city of Bundi?
A_en: Rao Jaisam, also known as Thakkar, established the city of Bundi.
explanation_en: Jait Singh was a Rajput king who founded the city of Bundi during his reign. Bundi, also known as Bhilwana, is a historical city in Rajasthan.
question_en: Who is the founder of the Jaisam Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Kushwara was a Rajput king who founded the city of Jaisam in Rajasthan.
